predicate.note: Frames file for 'don' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry 41.3.1, no other framed members. No Framenet entry. Comparison with 'put on'.

example.name: one of a few
example.text: But as Judge Thomas M. Jenkins donned his robes so he could give final approval, the major earthquake struck, its epicenter not far from his courtroom in Redwood City, Calif.
example.arg: so he could give final approval
